import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Header from './components/Header/Header' import Skeleton from '@material-ui/lab/Skeleton'; import GroupIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Group'; import PersonIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Person'; function Main() { const userInfo = useSelector(state => state.userInfo) const { user, html_url, name, login, loading, error, avatar_url, followers, following, repos } = userInfo const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

) } const styles = { content : { background: "#F9F9F9", minHeight: "calc(100vh - 72px)", display: "flex", padding: "40px 56px", justifyContent: 'space-between', flexWrap: 'wrap' }, contentLeft : { margin: "0 56px 2rem 0", display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'start', width: '26%', maxWidth: '280px', minWidth: '280px' }, contentRight : { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", minHeight: 'calc(100vh - 152px)', maxWidth: "90%", minWidth: '740px', width: "66%" } } export default Main
